channel.title: GCPT - Personal Training Blog
channel.description: Personal training insights, tips and updates from GCPT Brisbane

item.title: Why Choose a Personal Trainer Over a Gym Membership?
item.description: If you're weighing up whether to invest in a personal trainer or stick with a standard gym membership, you're not alone. Many Brisbane residents face this decision when they're serious about getting fit and healthy. Here's why personal training delivers better results than going it alone at the gym.

item.title: Personal Training for NDIS Participants: Creating Inclusive Fitness Goals
item.description: Fitness should be accessible to everyone, and that's exactly what NDIS funding for personal training makes possible. As an NDIS-registered personal trainer here in Brisbane, discover how transformative proper fitness support can be for participants.

item.title: Why Personalised Training Beats Fitness Trends in 2025
item.description: Every year brings new fitness trends promising to be the "game changer" you've been waiting for. In 2025, we're seeing everything from AI-powered workouts to extreme recovery protocols. But here's the thing â€“ the most effective approach to fitness isn't trendy at all. It's personalised.
